task.en: I'm preparing slides to explain to my students how an AC writes a meta review. Help me find the article "Training language models to follow instructions with human feedback" on OpenReview, then copy its meta review into a blank Pages document.
task.zh: 我在准备slides，给我的学生讲解AC是怎么写meta review的。帮我在OpenReview上找到Training language models to follow instructions with human feedback这篇文章，然后把它的meta review复制下来，放到一个空白的Pages文稿里面。
task.ar: أنا أُعد الشرائح لشرح كيفية كتابة AC لـ meta review لطلابي. ساعدني في العثور على المقالة "Training language models to follow instructions with human feedback" على OpenReview، ثم انسخ meta review إلى مستند Pages فارغ.
task.ja: スライドを作成して、学生たちにACがmeta reviewを書く方法を説明しています。"Training language models to follow instructions with human feedback"という記事をOpenReviewで探して、そのmeta reviewを空白のPagesドキュメントにコピーしてください。
task.ru: Я готовлю слайды, чтобы объяснить студентам, как AC пишет meta review. Помогите мне найти статью "Training language models to follow instructions with human feedback" на OpenReview, затем скопируйте её meta review в пустой документ Pages.

grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to get body text of front document' | grep -q "This paper demonstrates that a smaller model (1.7B InstructGPT) trained with human feedback (using a learned reward model and PPO) is competitive with a much larger pretrained model (175B GPT-3). The results are clearly convincing. The main downside is that there isn’t much analysis on the proposed method (e.g. the influence of the RL algorithm and the amount of human feedback needed). That said, the approach is novel and the results are impressive, which points out new directions for collecting better pretraining data. Thus, I lean towards acceptance." && echo "True" || echo "False"
